00026 
00027 void start_daemon() {
00028 
00029         if ( 0 == access(LOCKFILE, 0) ) {
00030                 fprintf(stderr, "Daemon couldn't be started.\nIs another instance started? When not please delete the file: %s\n", LOCKFILE);
00031                 exit(1);
00032         }
00033 
00034         pid_t d_pid = fork();
00035 
00036         if ( 0 > d_pid ) {
00037                 fprintf(stderr, "Error in start_daemon(): %s\n", errno);
00038                 exit(1);
00039         }
00040 
00041         if ( 0 < d_pid ) {
00042                 printf("Daemon started succesfully!\n");
00043                 exit(0);
00044         } else {
00045                 FILE *lockfile = fopen(LOCKFILE, "w");
00046                 fprintf(lockfile, "%d\n", getpid());
00047                 fclose(lockfile);
00048         }
00049 }
00050 
00051 void stop_daemon() {
00052         printf("Daemon will be closed...\n");
00053         remove(LOCKFILE);
00054         exit(0);
00055 }
00056 
00057 void dbus_listen() {
00058         DBusMessage *msg;
00059         DBusMessage *reply;
00060         DBusMessageIter args;
00061         DBusConnection *conn;
00062         DBusError error;
00063         int ret;
00064         char *param;
00065 
00066         dbus_error_init(&error);
00067 
00068         conn = dbus_bus_get(DBUS_BUS_SESSION, &error);
00069         if ( dbus_error_is_set(&error) ) {
00070                 // TODO: Substitude with a log entry
00071                 fprintf(stderr, "Connection Error (%s)\n", error.message);
00072                 dbus_error_free(&error);
00073         }
00074         if ( NULL == conn ) {
00075                 fprintf(stderr, "Connection Null\n");
00076                 exit(1);
00077         }
00078 
00079         ret = dbus_bus_request_name(conn, "to.networld.moksec.phonefirewall", DBUS_NAME_FLAG_REPLACE_EXISTING, &error);
00080         if ( dbus_error_is_set(&error) ) {
00081                 // TODO: Substitude with a log entry
00082                 fprintf(stderr, "Name Error (%s)\n", error.message);
00083                 dbus_error_free(&error);
00084         }
00085         if ( DBUS_REQUEST_NAME_REPLY_PRIMARY_OWNER != ret ) {
00086                 fprintf(stderr, "Not Primary Owner (%d)\n", ret);
00087                 exit(1);
00088         }
00089 
00090         while (true) {
00091                 dbus_connection_read_write(conn, 0);
00092                 msg = dbus_connection_pop_message(conn);
00093 
00094                 if ( NULL == msg ) {
00095                         sleep(1);
00096                         continue;
00097                 }
00098 
00099                 if ( dbus_message_is_method_call(msg, "to.networld.moksec.phonefirewall.Checking", "checkwhitelist") )
00100                         printf("Here comes the method call check_blacklist_entry(...)\n");
00101                 if ( dbus_message_is_method_call(msg, "to.networld.moksec.phonefirewall.Checking", "checkblacklist") )
00102                         printf("Here comes the method call check_whitelist_entry(...)\n");
00103 
00104                 dbus_message_unref(msg);
00105         }
00106 
00107 }
